name: Canadian Tire Auto Service Centre
address: Canadian Tire Auto Service Centre, 2830 Bentall St, Vancouver, BC V5M 4H4

featured_reviews.review_id: The most disorganized automotive service centre I have come across. Missing paperwork, quoted times hours off, every service writer providing different information, zero customer communication whatsoever. Polite but ineffective.
featured_reviews.review_text: The most disorganized automotive service centre I have come across. Missing paperwork, quoted times hours off, every service writer providing different information, zero customer communication whatsoever. Polite but ineffective.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I need it Winter Tires for my GMC vehicle, and Tao the Manager of the Shop suggested me to get the Michelin tires for my SUV.  They had it installed and also they check to see if there was anything else my vehicle was in need of repair work need it.

Peter the installer was so nice to pack my All Season Tires in a Bag without any ripping and cleaned.

I have taken my vehicle for repairs for many years now and I trust thier work and dedication plus they care for the customer and tell you what is need it and what you don't need as many other shops that try to sell you things you don't need.

I would recommend this location to anyone who needs any kind of work for your vehicle.

Clean Shop, Nice and pleasant staff plus excellent service.

As Auto Centre Repair Shop they perform many type of repairs like:

Tire Installation, Tire Change, Engine Repair, Car Inspection, Tire Centre, Tire Shop, Oil Change, Tire Repair, Car Repairs, Van Repairs, Truck Repairs, Book Appointment, Winter Installation, Summer Installation, Radiator Repair and System Flush, Transmission Oil Change, Repairs, Shop, Flat Tire Repair.
featured_reviews.review_text:
I need it Winter Tires for my GMC vehicle, and Tao the Manager of the Shop suggested me to get the Michelin tires for my SUV.  They had it installed and also they check to see if there was anything else my vehicle was in need of repair work need it.

As Auto Centre Repair Shop they perform many type of repairs like:

Tire Installation, Tire Change, Engine Repair, Car Inspection, Tire Centre, Tire Shop, Oil Change, Tire Repair, Car Repairs, Van Repairs, Truck Repairs, Book Appointment, Winter Installation, Summer Installation, Radiator Repair and System Flush, Transmission Oil Change, Repairs, Shop, Flat Tire Repair.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi G Brenes, I'm happy to hear that the Auto Service Team has provided you with such great service over the years and I'll be sure to recognize both Tao and Peter for the extra effort during your recent winter tire purchase. It's great to see such a detailed review outlining all the various services we provide our customers coming from a prominent local guide. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you over the years. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you during your next visit.
- Chris, General Manager

featured_reviews.review_id:
Cons: Very lack of products.
Example, No in stock windshield washer all seasons.
Not enough stock for oil drain plug, very expensive $8 dollars when it's real cost only $3 buck.
The brake shoes or brake pad not on shelter.
Mostly products overpriced.

Pros: convenient nearby groceries shopping.
featured_reviews.review_text:
Cons: Very lack of products.
Example, No in stock windshield washer all seasons.
Not enough stock for oil drain plug, very expensive $8 dollars when it's real cost only $3 buck.
The brake shoes or brake pad not on shelter.
Mostly products overpriced.

Pros: convenient nearby groceries shopping.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
We appreciate your feedback, and we're sorry to hear about your experience. We'll work on addressing the product availability and pricing concerns you've raised. Your comments are valuable and will help us improve. We're pleased to know you find our location convenient for nearby groceries, and we hope to better serve you in the future. Thank you for sharing your thoughts.

Grandview Auto Centre Team

featured_reviews.review_id: In store shopping two week ago and found excellent staff service with locating all the shoppings I need. The employee "Mei Lin" was fast and efficient into helping me find all the items I need, she also helped me locate two hand-trucks and push them to the cashier for me. Well done!
featured_reviews.review_text: In store shopping two week ago and found excellent staff service with locating all the shoppings I need. The employee "Mei Lin" was fast and efficient into helping me find all the items I need, she also helped me locate two hand-trucks and push them to the cashier for me. Well done!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thanks, Richard! We will be sure to recognize Mei Lin for her efforsts. We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit!

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id: Go to Canadian tire to buy camping gear never to fix your car or change a tire, just waited 2 hours to have them tell me they can't fix my tire, they probably had made this assesment in the first 2 minites , had to actually ask to see what was going on or they would have had me waiting another 2 hours! Not the first time I have had bad service. Will never be back to fix anything regarding my vehicles.
featured_reviews.review_text: Go to Canadian tire to buy camping gear never to fix your car or change a tire, just waited 2 hours to have them tell me they can't fix my tire, they probably had made this assesment in the first 2 minites , had to actually ask to see what was going on or they would have had me waiting another 2 hours! Not the first time I have had bad service. Will never be back to fix anything regarding my vehicles.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
We value your rating and feedback, Adan. We're sorry we did not meet your expectations during your recent visit to our shop.

Grandview Auto Centre Team

featured_reviews.review_id:
Superb service, communication, and pricing. For something straightforward like a tire change, you can't go wrong here.

It's not their fault the City of Vancouver decided to divert most of its residential development to commercial and industrial areas, creating a shortage of mechanic shop space. All shops are busy these days.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:

featured_reviews.review_id:
This canadian tire is just understaffed, understocked, employees have no care here.

Get away from the self checkouts they are horrible you employe people to work yes? Then let's get them to have a cheerful manner, create a place we want to come back to, h9nestly I dread coming here and when I forget about how horrible your workers are, I leave completely dissapointed and reminded about why I hate this canadian tire.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We're sorry to hear that you had a negative experience at our store. We take customer service seriously, and we apologize if our employees did not provide the level of service you expected. We will address this issue with our staff and work to improve our customer service standards. We appreciate your feedback, and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you better in the future.

featured_reviews.review_id: Have a flat tire asked them how much to repair it. Was told around $40 but no appointments for 10 days! Leave the car if you want. That's Canada's garage for you. Can't do a 10 minute repair so a guy can get to work. Mechanic down the road said bring it right in it's a quick fix.
featured_reviews.review_text: Have a flat tire asked them how much to repair it. Was told around $40 but no appointments for 10 days! Leave the car if you want. That's Canada's garage for you. Can't do a 10 minute repair so a guy can get to work. Mechanic down the road said bring it right in it's a quick fix.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
We value your rating and feedback, Ty. Sorry we did not meet your expectations we will share this with our leadership team.

CT Grandview Team
